title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with readline, syntax highlighting, and conversation history.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (Windows/macOS/Linux).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering async client and typed API for Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate/chat/embed methods.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose examples for CPU & GPU setups.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with threaded replies and app mentions.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repository for proposing and discussing Ollama features and API changes.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for fine-tuned and custom GGUF models.
